results.title: The effect of beta-blockade on leg blood flow in hypertensive patients with intermittent claudication.
results.text_hl: Seven @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Intermittent_Claudication</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007383 @@@intermittent claudication@@@ were randomly allocated to treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ 100 mg or @CHEMICAL_Pindolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010869 @@@pindolol@@@ 10 mg.

citations.NLM: Boström PA, Janzon L, Ohlsson O, Westergren A. The effect of beta-blockade on leg blood flow in hypertensive patients with intermittent claudication. Angiology. 1986 Mar;37(3 Pt 1):149-53. PMID: 3706817

results.title: A comparison of the hypotensive effects of captopril and atenolol in the treatment of hypertension in diabetic patients.
results.text_hl: Two @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ dropped out, one because of @<m>DISEASE_Intermittent_Claudication</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007383 @@@intermittent claudication@@@ during @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, one with @DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@cardiac arrhythmia@@@ during placebo.

citations.NLM: Elving LD, de Nobel E, van Lier HJ, Thien T. A comparison of the hypotensive effects of captopril and atenolol in the treatment of hypertension in diabetic patients. J Clin Pharmacol. 1989 Apr;29(4):316-20. PMID: 2656775

results.title: Beta blockers for peripheral arterial disease.
results.text_hl: However, optimal therapy for people with @DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@CAD@@@ accompanied by @<m>DISEASE_Intermittent_Claudication</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007383 @@@intermittent claudication@@@ has been controversial due to the presumed peripheral haemodynamic consequences of beta blockers, leading to worsening symptoms of @<m>DISEASE_Intermittent_Claudication</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007383 @@@intermittent claudication@@@.

citations.NLM: Paravastu SC, Mendonca D, Da Silva A. Beta blockers for peripheral arterial disease. Cochrane Database Syst Rev. 2008 Oct 8;(4):CD005508. PMID: 18843692
citations.BibTeX: @article{18843692, title={Beta blockers for peripheral arterial disease.}, author={Paravastu SC and Mendonca D and Da Silva A}, journal={Cochrane Database Syst Rev}, number={4}, pages={CD005508}}
